main event: Mr. Norman D. Quaker reported sighting an unidentified flying object at 9:50 p.m. on June 6, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as round and having a glowing red light.,The object moved rapidly and silently through the sky.,The duration of the sighting was approximately 3 minutes.,No other witnesses observed the object.,The Weather Bureau reported no unusual weather conditions at the time.
sighted object: a round object with a glowing red light
witness description: Mr. Norman D. Quaker, 12 Columbia Avenue, Battle Creek, Michigan
